## Load the data

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
data_AI <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MaveKimaraAlexander/PBA-Final-Project-Group-8-/refs/heads/main/Enterprise_GenAI_Adoption_Impact.csv")
```

## Visualization 1: GAI Adoption Trend

```{r}
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-align: "center"
data_AI %>%
  count(`Adoption Year`) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Adoption Year`, y = n)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue", size = 1.2) +
  geom_point(color = "darkred", size = 2) +
  labs(
    title = "Trend of GenAI Adoption Over the Years",
    x = "Year of Adoption",
    y = "Number of Companies"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    legend.position = "right",
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
```

## Visualization 2: Productivity change over time by Industry

```{r}
#| fig-width: 10
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-align: "center"
ggplot(data_AI, aes(x = `Adoption Year`, 
                    y = `Productivity Change (%)`, 
                    color = Industry, 
                    group = Industry)) +
  stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line", size = 1) +
  stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "point", size = 2) +
  labs(
    title = "Trend of Productivity Change by Industry (2022â€“2024)",
    x = "Adoption Year",
    y = "Productivity Change (%)",
    color = "Industry"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "right",
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

```
